hero.name: Skylar Liang
hero.description: I'm a software engineer building PM tools at Amazon. I like owning features end-to-end and working on things people actually use. Looking for full-stack or product engineer roles at smaller companies where I can move fast and have real impact.

about.title: About Me
about.content: Software engineer with 3 years at Amazon, mostly building internal tools for product teams. I've worked across the stack - React frontends, Java backends, AWS infrastructure - and I'm good at jumping into unfamiliar codebases and figuring things out quickly. I like projects where I can solve actual problems, not just implement specs someone handed me. Outside of work: overpriced coffee, bouldering, running (did a half marathon once, never again), crochet and other tech stereotype may apply. Based in Vancouver, BC, open to remote or relocating.

experience.title: Where I've Been
experience.subtitle: A quick tour of my adventures in tech land. Spoiler: there's been a lot of learning (and coffee).

jobs.description: Building scalable web applications and leading frontend architecture decisions. Working with modern technologies to deliver exceptional user experiences.
Developed and maintained web applications. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver features on time.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Side projects and experiments in code.

comingSoon.title: Cooking Up Something Fun
comingSoon.description: My projects are currently in stealth mode (aka I'm still working on them). Stay tuned for the big reveal!

contact.title: Say Hello!
contact.subtitle: Looking for full-stack or product engineer roles at smaller (than Amazon) companies where I can get my hands on different things and move quickly.
